ing: 1/4 teaspoon granular no-calorie sucralose sweetener (such as SplendaÂ®)
des: "When I was stationed overseas in Sembach, Germany, all of the restaurants served this salad dressing. So simple and so tasty. It's slightly creamy and very tangy. Don't worry if it seems watery, it's supposed to be that way! If you like more of a sweeter dressing, try using evaporated milk instead."
ins: Whisk the half-and-half, vinegar, salt, and sweetener together in a bowl until the sweetener is dissolved.
